item.text: Elso Kilpi questions the cultural metaphors that guide our actions at work and in society as belonging to an outmoded industrial era. Creative, knowledge-based work crosses traditional organisational boundaries: organisations are emergent self-organising processes. [https://medium.com/@EskoKilpi/advanced-work-5ac3d810fe49 essay].
